content: Phase 1.1: Fix 4K Video Buffer Configuration - Implement adaptive buffer sizing based on resolution
Phase 1.2: Fix Performance Monitor CPU Calculation - Implement delta-based CPU usage calculation
Phase 1.3: Thread Safety for Storage Operations - Convert MarkerPersistence to actor-based concurrency
Phase 2.1: Add Comprehensive Accessibility Support - Add VoiceOver support to all UI elements
Phase 2.2: Optimize Keyboard Shortcut Registry - Implement proper caching for O(1) lookup
Phase 2.3: Refactor Complex Views - Break down ContentView into focused components
Phase 3.1: Implement Marker Pagination - Support 10,000+ markers with lazy loading
Phase 3.2: Complete Shortcut Conflict Detection - Add all missing shortcuts to conflict detection
Phase 4.1: Optimize Performance Monitoring - Implement Combine-based debounced updates
Phase 4.2: Memory Optimization - Implement LRU cache for markers
Phase 4.3: Error Handling Improvements - Convert validation methods to throw errors
